title: AVAPOW Car Jump Starter, 4000A Peak 27800mAh Battery Jump Starter (for All Gas or Up to 10L Diesel), Battery Booster Power Pack, 12V Auto Jump Box with LED Light, USB Quick Charge 3.0, 4000A peak current, includes 88Wh portable battery charger
descriptions:
AVAPOW Car Jump Starter — a simple, safe way to get your car going.

What it is:
- A small, powerful battery you keep in your car. If your car battery is dead, this can start your car without needing another vehicle.

Why it’s helpful:
- Strong power: Can start all gas cars and diesel engines up to 10 liters.
- Works many times: Up to 40 starts on a full charge.
- Easy to carry: Compact, with a sturdy case.

Safe and simple:
- Clear, color-coded clamps.
- Built-in protections to keep you safe: prevents sparks, wrong connection, overheating, and damage from low battery.
- Metal clamps and rugged design for long life.

Handy extras:
- Bright built-in light with three modes: flashlight, SOS, and strobe (for emergencies).
- Charges your phone or tablet fast: two USB ports and a USB-C port. It charges up to 75% faster than regular power banks.
- Can power small 12V car accessories with the included cigarette lighter converter.

What’s in the box:
- Portable Battery Starter
- Jumper Cables
- USB-C Cable
- Cigarette Lighter Converter
- Carry Case
- Easy-to-read User Manual

Good to know:
- For 12V vehicles: cars, motorcycles, ATVs/UTVs, lawn mowers, and snowmobiles.
- Battery size: 27,800 mAh (88 Wh).
- Peak power: 4000 A.
- Adapter (wall charger) not included. You can charge it with any standard USB charger using the included USB-C cable.
- Friendly help is available: 24-hour online support.

How to use (simple steps):
1) Turn off your car and open the hood.
2) Attach the red clamp to the + (positive) battery post.
3) Attach the black clamp to the – (negative) post or clean metal on the car.
4) Press the power button on the jump starter.
5) Start your car. Remove the clamps in reverse order.
6) Recharge the jump starter after use, so it’s ready next time.

AVAPOW makes a stressful moment easy. Keep one in your glove box, and drive with peace of mind.
